description:
Luigi's Mansion is an adventure game starring everyone's favorite plumber brother, Luigi.
Luigi has won a strange mansion but upon arriving, he discovers it's full of ghosts, with his brother inside!
Armed with the mysterious Poltergust 3000, Luigi will need to overcome his fears to kick the ghosts out
before he can move in and save Mario!

0.4.10-Betar2.title: (internal testing dont use) Luigis Mansion AP 0.4.10-Beta

0.4.10-Betar3.title: (internal testing don't use) Luigis Mansion AP 0.4.10-Beta

V0.4.10r2.description:
# Luigi's Mansion AP V0.4.10 Beta
Windows / Linux Compatible

## New Stuff
- Potentially now supports Linux
- E. Gadd's cutscene from the lab will now skip playing the movie and will teleport you to your starting room
- Support 0.6.2 changes and now patches are downloadable via the site
- Split dependencies for Linux and Windows users.
- Updated some more TrapLink support
- Automatically download libraries, no longer need to do that yourself

## Bug Fixes
- Fix Fear and Pickup animations fixes
- 1F Bathroom Shelf Key now correctly accounted for with enemizer logic

## What Needs Tested:
- UT Logic with these new fixes
- Suggestions for furniture location names

## Known Issues
- No MacOS
- Client rarely unable to connect dolphin to check game ID. Reloading ISO should fix the issue.
- If you are getting an issue of "Randomized Rom issue not loading", make sure that "Emulated Memory Size Override" is turned off in Dolphin
- Items will de-spawn if you travel 2 rooms away. This is hard coded behavior that cannot be removed
- If you receive traps during an animation, the trap will not trigger because you are in an animation, such as doors, warping or successfully vacuuming a Boo/Portrait Ghost
- If you load in too quickly, sounds will be bugged for a brief period of time
- The 1F Bathroom corner runs into the boo gate event. (Currently investigating other choices to fix this)
- Non-unique items will respawn from locations that can drop them (such as Diamonds)
- Luigi can be revived by receiving health after dying but before death screen.

[Base Game Changes](https://github.com/BootsinSoots/Archipelago/blob/Luigi's-Mansion-AP/worlds/luigismansion/docs/Base%20ISO%20Changes.md)
[Dolphin GC/Wii Emulator](https://dolphin-emu.org/download/)
[Setup Guide](https://github.com/BootsinSoots/Archipelago/blob/Luigi's-Mansion-AP/worlds/luigismansion/docs/setup_en.md)
V0.4.10r2.title: Luigis Mansion AP V0.4.10 Beta

V0.4.3.description:
# Luigi's Mansion APWorld 0.4.3 Beta (the Bug Update)
Currently only available for Windows, apologies to other OS.
THIS WILL NOT BE BACKWARDS COMPATIBLE WITH OLDER AP WORLDS / PREVIOUSLY GENERATED SEEDS.

# New Stuff
- Elemental Medals and Mario items no longer have any pickup animations when pickup animations are turned off.
- Added a bunch of logs to LM Client to help troubleshoot why clients are failing to patch and what step it is getting "stuck" at.
- Changed more UT Stuff
- Became compatible with 0.6.2 beta clients and can now use new clients for AP / UT.
- Updated Boo Label to have a consistent size in the client.
- In the Breaker Room, the doors are now locked for a brief period to allow that event to finish loading properly (hopefully this prevents any issues were blackout seems to be stuck on in some cases)
- Boo Radar logic now does not account for you catching any boos until you have at least one door unlocked (so you can leave and re-enter)
- Added thorns on Clairvoya's door to prevent that event from having issues.
- When capturing a boo, you no longer have to walk back to the original room, you will be able to get the reward immediately.
- The Boolossus Balcony event will now appear on the balcony side if your spawn location is on the west side. (in other words, if your random start is telephone room or clockwork room for instance, your Boolossus event will move onto the balcony instead of still being in the east hallway, preventing you from opening that door).

## Bug Fixes!
- GetItem command should work again for everything.
- Fixed an issue where Boolossus was reappearing. Made similar changes to prevent Bogmire and Chauncey events from trying to trigger again.
- All items found / received should be in-game now.
- Toad Text boxes should provide a toad face instead of the weird options it was choosing before.
- Twins Room chest is now fixed again and should provide the random item in the chest instead of mario's shoe.
- An issue where the client was stuck "infinitely" has been fixed. Patching should be back to a few mins at most for slower computers.
- Items that had shared names from other games (such as 10 coins) should no longer give items in LM.
- The Red Diamond on the balcony plant was removed to prevent issues with our custom code from pickup animations being disabled.
- Grimmly UT Logic fixes.

## What Needs Tested:
- Everything listed in New Stuff and Bug Fixes
- UT Logic with these new fixes
- Suggestions for furniture location names
- Possession traps should always be received regardless of if the source is your game or not.

## Known Issues
- Linux build dependencies included in file, currently appear unworkable.
- No MacOS support.
- Client rarely unable to connect dolphin to check game ID. Reloading ISO should fix the issue
- Items will de-spawn if you travel 2 rooms away. This is hard coded behavior that cannot be removed
- If you receive traps during an animation, the trap will not trigger because you are in an animation, such as doors, warping or successfully vacuuming a Boo/Portrait Ghost
- If you load in too quickly, sounds will be bugged for a little while
- The 1F Bathroom corner runs into the boo gate event. This cannot be fixed without worse bugs occurring
- Non-unique items will respawn from locations that can drop them
- No more than 2 gold bars can be on screen at the same time. There is no way to fix this.
- Luigi can be revived by receiving health after dying but before death screen.

[Base Game Changes](https://github.com/BootsinSoots/Archipelago/blob/Luigi's-Mansion-AP/worlds/luigismansion/docs/Base%20ISO%20Changes.md)
[Dolphin GC/Wii Emulator](https://dolphin-emu.org/download/)
[Setup Guide](https://github.com/BootsinSoots/Archipelago/blob/Luigi's-Mansion-AP/worlds/luigismansion/docs/setup_en.md)
V0.4.3.title: Luigi's Mansion APWorld 0.4.3 Beta

V0.4.4.description:
# Luigi's Mansion APWorld 0.4.4 Beta (the Bug Update)
Currently only available for Windows, apologies to other OS.
THIS WILL NOT BE BACKWARDS COMPATIBLE WITH OLDER AP WORLDS / PREVIOUSLY GENERATED SEEDS.

# New Stuff (Small fix for Breaker Room + all changes from 0.4.3)
- Elemental Medals and Mario items no longer have any pickup animations when pickup animations are turned off.
- Added a bunch of logs to LM Client to help troubleshoot why clients are failing to patch and what step it is getting "stuck" at.
- Changed more UT Stuff
- Became compatible with 0.6.2 beta clients and can now use new clients for AP / UT.
- Updated Boo Label to have a consistent size in the client.
- In the Breaker Room, the doors are now locked for a brief period to allow that event to finish loading properly
- Boo Radar logic now does not account for you catching any boos until you have at least one door unlocked (so you can leave and re-enter)
- Added thorns on Clairvoya's door to prevent that event from having issues.
- When capturing a boo, you no longer have to walk back to the original room, you will be able to get the reward immediately.
- The Boolossus Balcony event will now appear on the balcony side if your spawn location is on the west side. (in other words, if your random start is telephone room or clockwork room for instance, your Boolossus event will move onto the balcony instead of still being in the east hallway, preventing you from opening that door).

## Bug Fixes!
- GetItem command should work again for everything.
- Fixed an issue where Boolossus was reappearing. Made similar changes to prevent Bogmire and Chauncey events from trying to trigger again.
- All items found / received should be in-game now.
- Toad Text boxes should provide a toad face instead of the weird options it was choosing before.
- Twins Room chest is now fixed again and should provide the random item in the chest instead of mario's shoe.
- An issue where the client was stuck "infinitely" has been fixed. Patching should be back to a few mins at most for slower computers.
- Items that had shared names from other games (such as 10 coins) should no longer give items in LM.
- The Red Diamond on the balcony plant was removed to prevent issues with our custom code from pickup animations being disabled.
- Grimmly UT Logic fixes.

## What Needs Tested:
- Everything listed in New Stuff and Bug Fixes
- UT Logic with these new fixes
- Suggestions for furniture location names
- Possession traps should always be received regardless of if the source is your game or not.

## Known Issues
- No MacOS / Linux support.
- Client rarely unable to connect dolphin to check game ID. Reloading ISO should fix the issue
- Items will de-spawn if you travel 2 rooms away. This is hard coded behavior that cannot be removed
- If you receive traps during an animation, the trap will not trigger because you are in an animation, such as doors, warping or successfully vacuuming a Boo/Portrait Ghost
- If you load in too quickly, sounds will be bugged for a little while
- The 1F Bathroom corner runs into the boo gate event. This cannot be fixed without worse bugs occurring
- Non-unique items will respawn from locations that can drop them
- No more than 2 gold bars can be on screen at the same time. There is no way to fix this.
- Luigi can be revived by receiving health after dying but before death screen.

[Base Game Changes](https://github.com/BootsinSoots/Archipelago/blob/Luigi's-Mansion-AP/worlds/luigismansion/docs/Base%20ISO%20Changes.md)
[Dolphin GC/Wii Emulator](https://dolphin-emu.org/download/)

V0.4.4.title: Luigi's Mansion APWorld 0.4.4

V0.4.5.description:
# Luigi's Mansion APWorld 0.4.5 Beta (more Bug Fixes)
Currently only available for Windows, apologies to other OS.
THIS WILL NOT BE BACKWARDS COMPATIBLE WITH OLDER AP WORLDS / PREVIOUSLY GENERATED SEEDS.

# New Stuff
- Adjusted all filler traps to allow them to be set as 0, as long as some other filler is enabled / set to a value greater than 0
- Adjusted some location names based on some feedback
- Added Trap Link support for new traps from other games
- Added "Attic Stairwell Visited" as a new Walksanity location
- Reduced default weight on possession traps
- Reduction in some generation time and fixes with various "duplicate location" errors.
- Updated our Credits to folks, setup page, and ISO changes.
- Updated how the lights turn on after bosses are defeated (NO MORE SPAN CHIMES! Shivers remains a separate thing still)

## Bug Fixes!
- Fixed an issue for early first keys
- Fixed hints on portrait ghosts when scanning their hearts (again)
- The Max Health heart no longer grows to the point of covering your entire screen.
- Music no longer speeds up over 100 health.
- Fixed a small bug with the Balcony door being locked in situations it should not have been.

## What Needs Tested:
- Everything listed in New Stuff and Bug Fixes
- UT Logic with these new fixes
- Suggestions for furniture location names
- Possession traps should always be received regardless of if the source is your game or not.

## Known Issues
- No MacOS / Linux support.
- Client rarely unable to connect dolphin to check game ID. Reloading ISO should fix the issue.
- If you are getting an issue of "Randomized Rom issue not loading", make sure that "Emulated Memory Size Override" is turned off in Dolphin
- Items will de-spawn if you travel 2 rooms away. This is hard coded behavior that cannot be removed
- If you receive traps during an animation, the trap will not trigger because you are in an animation, such as doors, warping or successfully vacuuming a Boo/Portrait Ghost
- If you load in too quickly, sounds will be bugged for a brief period of time
- The 1F Bathroom corner runs into the boo gate event. (Currently investigating other choices to fix this)
- Non-unique items will respawn from locations that can drop them
- No more than 2 gold bars can be on screen at the same time. There is no way to fix this.
- Luigi can be revived by receiving health after dying but before death screen.

[Base Game Changes](https://github.com/BootsinSoots/Archipelago/blob/Luigi's-Mansion-AP/worlds/luigismansion/docs/Base%20ISO%20Changes.md)
[Dolphin GC/Wii Emulator](https://dolphin-emu.org/download/)
[Setup Guide](https://github.com/BootsinSoots/Archipelago/blob/Luigi's-Mansion-AP/worlds/luigismansion/docs/setup_en.md)
V0.4.5.title: Luigi's Mansion APWorld 0.4.5 Beta (more Bug Fixes)

V0.4.6.description:
# Luigi's Mansion APWorld 0.4.6 Beta (more Bug Fixes, plus a quick hotfix for boo items/locations)
Currently only available for Windows, apologies to other OS.
THIS WILL NOT BE BACKWARDS COMPATIBLE WITH OLDER AP WORLDS / PREVIOUSLY GENERATED SEEDS.

# New Stuff
- Adjusted all filler traps to allow them to be set as 0, as long as some other filler is enabled / set to a value greater than 0
- Adjusted some location names based on some feedback
- Added Trap Link support for new traps from other games
- Added "Attic Stairwell Visited" as a new Walksanity location
- Reduced default weight on possession traps
- Reduction in some generation time and fixes with various "duplicate location" errors.
- Updated our Credits to folks, setup page, and ISO changes.
- Updated how the lights turn on after bosses are defeated (NO MORE SPAN CHIMES! Shivers remains a separate thing still)

## Bug Fixes (just a fix for boo items / locations, plus everything below from 0.4.5)!
- Fixed an issue for early first keys
- Fixed hints on portrait ghosts when scanning their hearts (again)
- The Max Health heart no longer grows to the point of covering your entire screen.
- Music no longer speeds up over 100 health.
- Fixed a small bug with the Balcony door being locked in situations it should not have been.

## What Needs Tested:
- Everything listed in New Stuff and Bug Fixes
- UT Logic with these new fixes
- Suggestions for furniture location names
- Possession traps should always be received regardless of if the source is your game or not.

## Known Issues
- No MacOS / Linux support.
- Client rarely unable to connect dolphin to check game ID. Reloading ISO should fix the issue.
- If you are getting an issue of "Randomized Rom issue not loading", make sure that "Emulated Memory Size Override" is turned off in Dolphin
- Items will de-spawn if you travel 2 rooms away. This is hard coded behavior that cannot be removed
- If you receive traps during an animation, the trap will not trigger because you are in an animation, such as doors, warping or successfully vacuuming a Boo/Portrait Ghost
- If you load in too quickly, sounds will be bugged for a brief period of time
- The 1F Bathroom corner runs into the boo gate event. (Currently investigating other choices to fix this)
- Non-unique items will respawn from locations that can drop them
- No more than 2 gold bars can be on screen at the same time. There is no way to fix this.
- Luigi can be revived by receiving health after dying but before death screen.

[Base Game Changes](https://github.com/BootsinSoots/Archipelago/blob/Luigi's-Mansion-AP/worlds/luigismansion/docs/Base%20ISO%20Changes.md)

V0.4.7.description:
# Luigi's Mansion AP 0.4.7 Beta
Windows Compatible, potentially now Linux as well.
THIS WILL NOT BE BACKWARDS COMPATIBLE WITH OLDER AP WORLDS / PREVIOUSLY GENERATED SEEDS.

# New Stuff
- Potentially now supports Linux
- Rename Luigi Fear and Pickup animation options
- New textbox on spawn to explain some things

## Bug Fixes (just a fix for boo items / locations, plus everything below from 0.4.5)!
- Fixed several generation bugs that would prevent seeds from being beatable
- Resolved some issues with players not receiving item due to un-handled ANSI / ASCII characters.

## What Needs Tested:
- UT Logic with these new fixes
- Suggestions for furniture location names

## Known Issues
- No MacOS
- Client rarely unable to connect dolphin to check game ID. Reloading ISO should fix the issue.
- If you are getting an issue of "Randomized Rom issue not loading", make sure that "Emulated Memory Size Override" is turned off in Dolphin
- Items will de-spawn if you travel 2 rooms away. This is hard coded behavior that cannot be removed
- If you receive traps during an animation, the trap will not trigger because you are in an animation, such as doors, warping or successfully vacuuming a Boo/Portrait Ghost
- If you load in too quickly, sounds will be bugged for a brief period of time
- The 1F Bathroom corner runs into the boo gate event. (Currently investigating other choices to fix this)
- Non-unique items will respawn from locations that can drop them (such as Diamonds)
- Luigi can be revived by receiving health after dying but before death screen.

V0.4.8.description:
# Luigi's Mansion AP V0.4.8 Beta
Windows Compatible, potentially now Linux as well.
This will be backwards compatible with 0.4.7 seeds.

# New Stuff
- Potentially now supports Linux
- Rename Luigi Fear and Pickup animation options
- New textbox on spawn to explain some things
- Split dependencies for Linux and Windows users.

## Bug Fixes
- Fixed several generation bugs that would prevent seeds from being beatable
- Resolved some issues with players not receiving item due to un-handled ANSI / ASCII characters.
- Fixed issues with random issues talking to toads and scanning portrait hearts.

## What Needs Tested:
- UT Logic with these new fixes
- Suggestions for furniture location names

## Known Issues
- No MacOS
- Client rarely unable to connect dolphin to check game ID. Reloading ISO should fix the issue.
- If you are getting an issue of "Randomized Rom issue not loading", make sure that "Emulated Memory Size Override" is turned off in Dolphin
- Items will de-spawn if you travel 2 rooms away. This is hard coded behavior that cannot be removed
- If you receive traps during an animation, the trap will not trigger because you are in an animation, such as doors, warping or successfully vacuuming a Boo/Portrait Ghost
- If you load in too quickly, sounds will be bugged for a brief period of time
- The 1F Bathroom corner runs into the boo gate event. (Currently investigating other choices to fix this)
- Non-unique items will respawn from locations that can drop them (such as Diamonds)
- Luigi can be revived by receiving health after dying but before death screen.

V0.4.9.title: Luigi's Mansion AP V0.4.9 Beta

V0.5.0.description:
# Luigis Mansion AP V0.5.0 (New Locations / Vacuum Update)
Windows / Linux Compatible

## New Stuff:
- Add new ghost-hiding furniture locations (specifically those that hid ghosts or speedy spirits previously)
- Add new starting and available base locations (Catch Training Room ghosts, Visiting E. Gadd in his lab, etc.).
- No Vacuum Start - start without vacuum
- Game Mode option - includes new Poltergust Hunt (Ice Rod hunt style)
- New Door rando options - “Door rando but Suite doors locked”, all doors unlocked, all doors locked
- Add EnergyLink as an option - Make use of all that money that’s just lying around! These commands: /send_energy, /receive_energy, and /display_energy are the commands for energy_link in the client
- Add option to reduce or increase the difficulty of the Boolossus fight
- Add Furniture items by floor as an option for Furnisanity
- Add option to scream MARIO into the client every time Luigi calls out "MARIO" in-game
- New client label containing Rank Requirement / Current Wallet value.
- 4 new trap items, with associated Trap Link
- Starting Rooms now have a toad, which that lets you warp back to the lab! Disabled if spawn already has a toad (such as the courtyard)
- The Poltergust now comes in Progressive Vacuums! Maybe there’s more than 2?

## Changes:
- Remove 1F Washroom boo gate completely, replace with key
- Remove Laundry Room from potential spawn locations due to issues with new toad
- Traps are now completely off by default
- Reworked the client to avoid death loops. If you die and you haven't saved, the game remembers what the last received item was. Upon respawning, you receive only the items missed since you last saved, but traps will get skipped.
- Changed the time of receiving items from ~3 seconds to less than 0.5 seconds. You do NOT have to wait in game for the receive text to actually have the item, in most cases you'll have the item before the text displays.
- Added more traps to be supported in trap link.
- Fixed an issue where Madam Clairvoya did not always appear when shining the light in her room.
- Gallery Event no longer requires you to knock on an angel statue or scan it to leave.

## Fixes:
- Fix Freestanding keys not having ghost logic rules
- Fix Well key not spawning or triggering
- Fix Sir Weston not sending checks when on
- Fix trap_link always being on
- Fix bug with auto_connect not working correctly
- Fix Item_links locations appearing in hints, I hope
- Fixes some slot name issues not properly supporting 16 UTF-8 characters.
- Removed Mr. Bones text in the Boneyard.
- Updated our third party dependencies to use a temp folder again. This is a set folder for now that will not auto delete itself, however if found will significantly decrease patching time on subsequent patching. 

## Known Issues:
- If you run on source and NOT on windows, there is an issue where line endings of certain files that remove CRLF and convert it to LF, causing the game to fail to load in multiple places, specifically around text in game. We are working on trying to figure out our git attributes file to resolve this issue, but now be aware talking to certain characters or scanning ghost hearts may crash the game.
- Sometimes the map currently does not display after picking up items (if pickup animations are on) and sometimes capturing boos are not triggering the save prompt. The latter can be solved by using the Save Anywhere code for now using down on the dpad + B.

[Base Game Changes](https://github.com/BootsinSoots/Archipelago/blob/Luigi's-Mansion-AP/worlds/luigismansion/docs/Base%20ISO%20Changes.md)
[Dolphin GC/Wii Emulator](https://dolphin-emu.org/download/)
[Setup Guide](https://github.com/BootsinSoots/Archipelago/blob/Luigi's-Mansion-AP/worlds/luigismansion/docs/setup_en.md)
V0.5.0.title: Luigis Mansion AP V0.5.0

V0.5.1.description:
# Luigis Mansion AP V0.5.1 (New Locations / Vacuum Update)
Windows / Linux Compatible

## New Stuff:
- See V0.5.0 for a full list of new features

## Changes:
- Was changed in V0.5.0 but was not mentioned -> Clairvoya should no longer disappear. If she does not spawn from shining a light on her crystal ball, inform us in the discord channel to help us indentify the issue, but saving quitting and reloading should fix the issue.
- Small text changes / color changes in the Gallery / Lab in game events.

## Fixes:
- Generation bugs that were related to vacuum_start but you excluded any vacuum upgrades.
- An issue where a "negative" amount of vacuums were detected.
- Traps should be working again
- Trap Link -> If you send a trap to others, you should also now receive it in game.
- Boo Counter display is fixed again for when Boosanity is selected.
- Fixed a misspelling with "Suite" instead of "Suit"
- Updated Boo Radar option description.
- Starting room toad will no longer kill you when you choose heal.
- Starting room toad location will now send properly.

## Known Issues:
- If you run on source and NOT on windows, there is an issue where line endings of certain files that remove CRLF and convert it to LF, causing the game to fail to load in multiple places, specifically around text in game. We are working on trying to figure out our git attributes file to resolve this issue, but now be aware talking to certain characters or scanning ghost hearts may crash the game.
- Sometimes the map currently does not display after picking up items (if pickup animations are on) and sometimes capturing boos are not triggering the save prompt. The latter can be solved by using the Save Anywhere code for now using down on the dpad + B.

[Base Game Changes](https://github.com/BootsinSoots/Archipelago/blob/Luigi's-Mansion-AP/worlds/luigismansion/docs/Base%20ISO%20Changes.md)
[Dolphin GC/Wii Emulator](https://dolphin-emu.org/download/)
[Setup Guide](https://github.com/BootsinSoots/Archipelago/blob/Luigi's-Mansion-AP/worlds/luigismansion/docs/setup_en.md)
V0.5.1.title: Luigis Mansion AP V0.5.1

V0.5.10.description:
# Luigi's Mansion AP Password Update!
Windows / Linux Compatible
INCOMPATIBLE WITH OLDER VERSIONS

## New
Make your rooms SpOoOoOoky for Spooky month!

## Fixes
Fixed a connection issue when multi-worlds had a password.
See 0.5.9 for other relevant fixes/changes

## Known Issues:
- Enemy element rando may rarely cause unbeatable seeds from self-locking items - please test this rigorously, to help find cause
- If you run on source and NOT on windows, there is an issue where line endings of certain files that remove CRLF and convert it to LF, causing the game to fail to load in multiple places, specifically around text in game. We are working on changing how this is handled.

[Base Game Changes](https://github.com/BootsinSoots/Archipelago/blob/Luigi's-Mansion-AP/worlds/luigismansion/docs/Base%20ISO%20Changes.md)
[Dolphin GC/Wii Emulator](https://dolphin-emu.org/download/)

V0.5.11.description:
# Luigi's Mansion AP Moar Bugfix!
Windows / Linux Compatible
INCOMPATIBLE WITH OLDER VERSIONS

## New
Make your rooms SpOoOoOoky for Spooky month!

## Fixes
Fixed the 1F back hallway not lighting up after catching Shivers, the Butler
Fixed the Well Key location not triggering
Changed some random instances to be deterministic
See 0.5.9 for other relevant fixes/changes

## Known Issues:
- Enemy element rando may rarely cause unbeatable seeds from self-locking items - please test this rigorously, to help find cause
- If you run on source and NOT on windows, there is an issue where line endings of certain files that remove CRLF and convert it to LF, causing the game to fail to load in multiple places, specifically around text in game. We are working on changing how this is handled.

[Base Game Changes](https://github.com/BootsinSoots/Archipelago/blob/Luigi's-Mansion-AP/worlds/luigismansion/docs/Base%20ISO%20Changes.md)
[Dolphin GC/Wii Emulator](https://dolphin-emu.org/download/)
[Setup Guide](https://github.com/BootsinSoots/Archipelago/blob/Luigi's-Mansion-AP/worlds/luigismansion/docs/setup_en.md)

V0.5.2.description:
# Luigis Mansion AP V0.5.2 (New Locations / Vacuum Update)
Windows / Linux Compatible

## New Stuff:
- See V0.5.0 for a full list of new features

## Changes:
- Energy Link has some verbiage changes
- Changed the Energy Link ratio.
- Changed the verbiage when selecting random boo health

## Fixes:
- Fixed an issue where Energy Link was failing to withdraw amounts properly.
- Fixed an issue where Fear animation and Pickup animations were swapped.
- Fixed several different generation bugs that caused generations to "hang" / get stuck.

## Known Issues:
- If you run on source and NOT on windows, there is an issue where line endings of certain files that remove CRLF and convert it to LF, causing the game to fail to load in multiple places, specifically around text in game. We are working on trying to figure out our git attributes file to resolve this issue, but now be aware talking to certain characters or scanning ghost hearts may crash the game.
- Sometimes the map currently does not display after picking up items (if pickup animations are on) and sometimes capturing boos are not triggering the save prompt. The latter can be solved by using the Save Anywhere code for now using down on the dpad + B.

[Base Game Changes](https://github.com/BootsinSoots/Archipelago/blob/Luigi's-Mansion-AP/worlds/luigismansion/docs/Base%20ISO%20Changes.md)
[Dolphin GC/Wii Emulator](https://dolphin-emu.org/download/)
[Setup Guide](https://github.com/BootsinSoots/Archipelago/blob/Luigi's-Mansion-AP/worlds/luigismansion/docs/setup_en.md)
V0.5.2.title: Luigis Mansion AP V0.5.2

V0.5.20.description:
# The "Thank you @eijebong for SSL Help" Update

Fixes an issue where folks were having issues with downloading third party dependencies from the GitHub releases automatically due to SSL errors. This is also now compatible with 0.6.4 again.

V0.5.21.description:
Fixed some generation bugs that, when combined with other multi-worlds, led to generations that got stuck/failed.

Fixed a logic rule where some checks (such as boos) were logically required when they should not have been when all doors in your spawn room were locked.

V0.5.3.description:
# Luigis Mansion AP V0.5.3 (New Locations / Vacuum Update)
Windows / Linux Compatible

## New Stuff:
- See V0.5.0 for a full list of new features

## Changes:
- Added more joke hints
- Added more traps supported in trap link
- Courtyard toad now allows you to teleport to lab

## Fixes:
- Fixed an issue where players were getting a vacuum earlier than intended.
- Fixed an issue where gold mice / speedy settings were causing some issues during patching despite not being set.

## Known Issues:
- If you run on source and NOT on windows, there is an issue where line endings of certain files that remove CRLF and convert it to LF, causing the game to fail to load in multiple places, specifically around text in game. We are working on trying to figure out our git attributes file to resolve this issue, but now be aware talking to certain characters or scanning ghost hearts may crash the game.
- Sometimes the map currently does not display after picking up items (if pickup animations are on) and sometimes capturing boos are not triggering the save prompt. The latter can be solved by using the Save Anywhere code for now using down on the dpad + B.

[Base Game Changes](https://github.com/BootsinSoots/Archipelago/blob/Luigi's-Mansion-AP/worlds/luigismansion/docs/Base%20ISO%20Changes.md)
[Dolphin GC/Wii Emulator](https://dolphin-emu.org/download/)

V0.5.5.description:
# Luigis Mansion AP V0.5.5 (The Refactor Update)
Windows / Linux Compatible
New notes on MacOS support, potentially
INCOMPATIBLE WITH OLDER VERSIONS

## New Stuff:
- Dolphin will now Auto-Launch after patching, as well as open the patched ROM / ISO itself 
- If you open "LM Client" on its own without clicking "Open Patch", it will auto launch Dolphin as well, but not open the patched ROM / ISO
- Added an option for filtering out received in-game text for everything, only progression, or nothing.
- Tons of new Traps supported in Trap Link (no new traps, just support from other games).
- Added RingLink, now your coins will sync with other games that support this feature. In other words if you gain or lose coins from Super Mario World or Sonic Adventure for instance, you will gain / lose coins in LM. We currently convert coins from 5 rings to 1 LM coin.
- Added support to receive messages in your LM CLient when RingLink send coins or you receive them. Can be toggled off in the options.
- Added support to receive messages in your LM CLient when TrapLink is enabled

## Changes:
- Re-ordered several of the player options to make things easier to find.
- Refactored several things behind the scenes to hopefully make Links of new types easier to support in the future and cleaned up the client to make several things a bit faster / more consistent.
- Adjusted several Spawn locations to prevent Starting Toad overlapping with objects in rooms.
- Prevent player from receiving traps via TrapLink they have weighted at 0

## Fixes:
- Fix an issue where hints were chosen for items/locations that do not belong to the player.
- Fixed hint spam in the client due to the above issue.
- Fix Well Key detection (hopefully)
- Fixed a bug making aliased slots receive their own traps
- Fixed a bug where non-local everything, Plando, and other relevant features were not working as expected.
- Fixed an issue where trap items were not always being received.

## Known Issues:
- Enemy element rando may rarely cause unbeatable seeds from self-locking items - please test this rigorously, to help find cause
- If you run on source and NOT on windows, there is an issue where line endings of certain files that remove CRLF and convert it to LF, causing the game to fail to load in multiple places, specifically around text in game. We are working on trying to figure out our git attributes file to resolve this issue, but now be aware talking to certain characters or scanning ghost hearts may crash the game.

[Base Game Changes](https://github.com/BootsinSoots/Archipelago/blob/Luigi's-Mansion-AP/worlds/luigismansion/docs/Base%20ISO%20Changes.md)
[Dolphin GC/Wii Emulator](https://dolphin-emu.org/download/)
[Setup Guide](https://github.com/BootsinSoots/Archipelago/blob/Luigi's-Mansion-AP/worlds/luigismansion/docs/setup_en.md)
V0.5.5.title: Luigis Mansion AP V0.5.5

V0.5.6.description:
# Luigis Mansion AP V0.5.6 (A Hotfix Update)
Windows / Linux Compatible
New notes on MacOS support, potentially
INCOMPATIBLE WITH OLDER VERSIONS

## New Stuff:
- Dolphin will now Auto-Launch after patching, as well as open the patched ROM / ISO itself 
- If you open "LM Client" on its own without clicking "Open Patch", it will auto launch Dolphin as well, but not open the patched ROM / ISO
- Added an option for filtering out received in-game text for everything, only progression, or nothing.
- Tons of new Traps supported in Trap Link (no new traps, just support from other games).
- Added RingLink, now your coins will sync with other games that support this feature. In other words if you gain or lose coins from Super Mario World or Sonic Adventure for instance, you will gain / lose coins in LM. We currently convert coins from 5 rings to 1 LM coin.
- Added support to receive messages in your LM CLient when RingLink send coins or you receive them. Can be toggled off in the options.
- Added support to receive messages in your LM CLient when TrapLink is enabled

## Changes:
- Re-ordered several of the player options to make things easier to find.
- Refactored several things behind the scenes to hopefully make Links of new types easier to support in the future and cleaned up the client to make several things a bit faster / more consistent.
- Adjusted several Spawn locations to prevent Starting Toad overlapping with objects in rooms.
- Prevent player from receiving traps via TrapLink they have weighted at 0
- Client will error on patch if APWorld version does not match server version

## Fixes:
- Fix an issue where hints were chosen for items/locations that do not belong to the player.
- Fixed hint spam in the client due to the above issue.
- Fix Well Key detection (hopefully)
- Fixed a bug making aliased slots receive their own traps
- Fixed a bug where non-local everything, Plando, and other relevant features were not working as expected.
- Fixed an issue where trap items were not always being received.
- Fixed bug where Early First Key would not place appropriately when "Everything" was non-local
- Fixed random generation failure from hints in multithreads

## Known Issues:
- Enemy element rando may rarely cause unbeatable seeds from self-locking items - please test this rigorously, to help find cause
- If you run on source and NOT on windows, there is an issue where line endings of certain files that remove CRLF and convert it to LF, causing the game to fail to load in multiple places, specifically around text in game. We are working on trying to figure out our git attributes file to resolve this issue, but now be aware talking to certain characters or scanning ghost hearts may crash the game.

[Base Game Changes](https://github.com/BootsinSoots/Archipelago/blob/Luigi's-Mansion-AP/worlds/luigismansion/docs/Base%20ISO%20Changes.md)
[Dolphin GC/Wii Emulator](https://dolphin-emu.org/download/)
[Setup Guide](https://github.com/BootsinSoots/Archipelago/blob/Luigi's-Mansion-AP/worlds/luigismansion/docs/setup_en.md)

Windows / Linux Compatible
INCOMPATIBLE WITH OLDER VERSIONS

## New Stuff:
- Dolphin will now Auto-Launch after patching, as well as open the patched ROM / ISO itself 
- If you open "LM Client" on its own without clicking "Open Patch", it will auto launch Dolphin as well, but not open the patched ROM / ISO
- Added an option for filtering out received in-game text for everything, only progression, or nothing.
- Tons of new Traps supported in Trap Link (no new traps, just support from other games).
- Added RingLink, now your coins will sync with other games that support this feature. In other words if you gain or lose coins from Super Mario World or Sonic Adventure for instance, you will gain / lose coins in LM. We currently convert coins from 5 rings to 1 LM coin.
- Added support to receive messages in your LM CLient when RingLink send coins or you receive them. Can be toggled off in the options.
- Added support to receive messages in your LM CLient when TrapLink is enabled

## Changes:
- Re-ordered several of the player options to make things easier to find.
- Refactored several things behind the scenes to hopefully make Links of new types easier to support in the future and cleaned up the client to make several things a bit faster / more consistent.

V0.6.0.description:
# Luigi's Mansion AP - 0.6.0 The "LM Masochist" Update
Windows / Linux Compatible
INCOMPATIBLE WITH OLDER VERSIONS

## New
Add a new category of location - things you’d never guess could be randomized
Added new locations for obtaining silver and gold portrait borders for portrait ghosts and bosses
Related, you can now respawn portrait ghosts by scanning their gallery paintings
Gallery Doors are now included in Door Model Rando.
Luigi’s Heart numbers will change colors based on health percentage (100%, 99%-80%, 79%-60%, 59-40%, 39% - 20%, and 19%-0%)
Luigis Mansion Tab of the client has the King Boo and Balcony Boo requirement numbers in the tab.

## Changes
Filler Item Weights are now OptDicts, instead of individual options. This means that all filler items are in one option and can easily all be set in one place.
Prevent Boolossus from having more than 8 traps assigned when Boosanity is on
Randomize ghosts in some rooms where element changes are not possible due to other events
Rooms will turn purple on the minimap if their boo has been caught
Vacuum upgrades now work on Boos and King Boo
Butler will spawn even in lit hallway
Extra boo spots will now be updated even when no furniture is randomized.
On screen messages are colored differently now
King Boo will not trigger without an A press
Prevent starting King Boo fight if you haven’t met rank requirement
Boo gates should properly function in blackout now.
Flashlights should stun a little longer.
When Boosanity is disabled, Received Boos now shows the caught Boo amount.

## Fixes
Fixed Armory and Ceramics Studio spawns not have Balcony boo gate reversed
Prevent Artist’s Easels from hiding Boos
Fixed Parlor room not spawning enemies in certain situations / not resetting if you leave mid-fight
Fix early first key not functioning correctly.
Finally fix respawning Diamonds/Gold Diamonds from Furniture (I hope)
Pearls will drop from portrait ghosts even with multiple vacuum upgrades
Ghost traps can be caught in lit rooms now
Fixed an issue where boo_hp, speed, etc. would not update to the player’s chosen options.
Changed Blackout event… again.
Prevent Toad menus from being accessible during blackout
All enemies/actors around Luigi should pause during the intro event so you can read the text without fear of being hit.

[Base Game Changes](https://github.com/BootsinSoots/Archipelago/blob/Luigi's-Mansion-AP/worlds/luigismansion/docs/Base%20ISO%20Changes.md)
[Dolphin GC/Wii Emulator](https://dolphin-emu.org/download/)
[Setup Guide](https://github.com/BootsinSoots/Archipelago/blob/Luigi's-Mansion-AP/worlds/luigismansion/docs/setup_en.md)
V0.6.0.title: Luigis Mansion AP V0.6.0
